Posts.Content: not the only one who gains weight with chemo. i packed on 52 pounds. thats a lot of weight on my small frame. i does however come back off. i had fat pockets that i never knew carried any fat deposits.  hang in there.
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: hi there. just please know you are not alone. stay strong and stay positive. i'll keep you in my prayers.
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: hi again. thanks for your post.  my mom's mom,my mom,2 of my sisters both under35 and my aunt all had breast cancer. wow!! MY MOM'S MOM NEVER NEW SHE HAD IT AS IT SHOWED UP IN HER AUDTOPSY,.(opps..sorry, i hit the cap button) my mom and my two sisters have now been cancer free for over 10 glorious years. my aunt actually died at 32 years of age back in 1960's as it had spread everywhere. back then, they really did not know how to treat it. my mom had a lumpectomy, f/b radiation. my two sisters just had radiation. all 3 took tomaxifil for 5 years. again i repeat....cancer free.  talk to your doctor and think about the options he gives you. a great big hug for you. nan
Posts.Title: What next....
